price: تر څو ستاسو لپاره يې درس وګرځوو او عبرت واخلي پند اخیستونکي غوږونه
arabic: لِنَجۡعَلَهَا لَكُمۡ تَذۡكِرَةٗ وَتَعِيَهَآ أُذُنٞ وَٰعِيَةٞ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: linajʿalahā lakum tadhkiratan wataʿiyahā udhunun wāʿiyatun
translations: and would be conscious of it
